This site was built using modern web technologies Patrick actively works with:

**Core Stack:**
- **Next.js** - React framework
- **TypeScript** - Type-safe development
- **Tailwind CSS** - Styling
- **Vercel** - Hosting & deployment

**Unique Feature:**
- **Model Context Protocol (MCP)** - Powers this AI chat interface you're using right now

**Supporting Tools:**
- Radix UI & shadcn/ui for accessible components
- Markdown/MDX for content
- Git & Bitbucket for version control

The site showcases Patrick's expertise in modern React development, AI integration, and thoughtful UI/UX design.
